stopNotes.comments: *** EXW – PRODUCTION LOAD – COULD SHUT DOWN PRODUCTION LINE ***​ ​ 20% OTD REQUIRED / FOOD GRADE TRAILER REQUIRED ​ ​ *** Driver must be able to scale up to 45,500, weight subject to change ***​ ​ Driver must have valid driver’s license – Photocopy, or company ID is not allowed​ ​ E-TRACK REQUIRED : ​ MACROPOINT, P44 OR FOURKITES – Drivers are required to accept tracking, turn location services on and if experiencing issues, reach out to Redwood tracking team. If using a local driver for pick up, the OTR driver information must also be provided, and tracking accepted as well.​ ​ ACCESSORIAL REQUIREMENTS: ​ ​ Detention : Must have etrack throughout the entire trip. ​ ​ Detention at Consignee : Gate Pass Required with IN/OUT times​ ​ Lumper or Accessorial Receipt must be sent within 7 days for carrier to receive compensation​
